title: Storm Wine
description: Pour a glass of seven previously published stories and one original tale of the end-of-the-world from Seattle author Nathan Crowder. Storm Wine collects tales of New Orelans ghosts, lustful fishwomen, junkyard rockets, dead rock stars, orphans, amorous zombies, and an autopsy video of the worst kind. Prepare to sample the often dark and frequenly savory tastes of the treasures that survive the storm.Contains: Deacon Carter's Last Dime, Fishwives of Sean Brolly, Frames of Reference, Memory in the Time of Bones, and four others, along with author notes for each story.
author: Nathan Crowder
